original_text: Thus saith the Lord, What iniquity have your fathers found in me, that they are gone far from me, and have walked after vanity, and are become vain?
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이와 같이 말하노라 너희 조상들이 내게서 무슨 불의함을 보았기에 나를 멀리 하고 가서 헛된 것을 따라 헛되이 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: What iniquity have your fathers found in me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상들이 내게서 무슨 불의를 발견하였느냐

sentences.original_text: that they are gone far from me
